titleStmt.title: The accomplish'd courtier. Consisting of institutions and examples. By which, courtiers and officers of state may square their transactions prudently and in good order and method. / By H.W. Gent.
Traicté de la cour. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Refuge, Eustache de, d. 1617.
W. H., gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring, and are to be sold at his shop at the George in Fleetstreet, neere Cliffords-Inne.,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the second part of: Refuge, Monsieur de (Eustache). Traicté de la cour.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the George in Fleetstreet, neere Cliffords-Inne.
